identity_provider.description: Name of the Identity Provider corresponding to this Membership. This is useful for workloads running in this cluster to use Workload Identity.

id.description: Fully qualified name of the GCP resource that owns the cluster. Should be immutable.

workload_identity_pool.description: Name of the Workload Identity Pool that this Membership is part of. This will be of the form proj-id.svc.id.goog. This is useful for workloads running in this cluster to use Workload Identity.
